com.espertech.esper.pattern
Interface EvalNode

All Known Implementing Classes:
EvalAndNode, EvalAuditNode, EvalEveryDistinctNode, EvalEveryNode, EvalFilterNode, EvalFollowedByNode, EvalGuardNode, EvalMatchUntilNode, EvalNodeBase, EvalNotNode, EvalObserverNode, EvalOrNode, EvalRootNode
public interface EvalNode

Superclass of all nodes in an evaluation tree representing an event pattern expression. Follows the Composite pattern. Child nodes do not carry references to parent nodes, the tree is unidirectional.
